verses.text_plain: My heart is inditing a good matter: I speak of the things which I have made touching the king: my tongue is the pen of a ready writer.
verses.verse_html:
1My heart is inditing a good matter: I speak of the things which I have made touching the king: my tongue is the pen of a ready writer. ▼
▼ Maschil: or, of instruction
 , ▼
▼ is inditing: Heb. boileth, or, bubbleth up

tokens.text: of the things which I have made

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Maschil: or, of instruction

footnotes.body_text: ▼ is inditing: Heb. boileth, or, bubbleth up
footnotes.body_html: ▼ is inditing: Heb. boileth, or, bubbleth up

verses.text_plain: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.
verses.verse_html: 2Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.

verses.text_plain: Gird thy sword upon thy thigh, O most mighty, with thy glory and thy majesty.
verses.verse_html: 3Gird thy sword upon thy thigh, O most mighty, with thy glory and thy majesty.

verses.text_plain: And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness and righteousness; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things.
verses.verse_html:
4And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness and righteousness; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things. ▼
▼ ride…: Heb. prosper thou, ride thou

footnotes.body_text: ▼ ride…: Heb. prosper thou, ride thou
footnotes.body_html: ▼ ride…: Heb. prosper thou, ride thou

verses.text_plain: Thine arrows are sharp in the heart of the king’s enemies; whereby the people fall under thee.
verses.verse_html: 5Thine arrows are sharp in the heart of the king’s enemies; whereby the people fall under thee.

verses.text_plain: Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre.
verses.verse_html: 6Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre.

verses.text_plain: Thou lovest righteousness, and hatest wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.
verses.verse_html: 7Thou lovest righteousness, and hatest wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.

verses.text_plain: All thy garments smell of myrrh, and aloes, and cassia, out of the ivory palaces, whereby they have made thee glad.
verses.verse_html: 8All thy garments smell of myrrh, and aloes, and cassia, out of the ivory palaces, whereby they have made thee glad.

verses.text_plain: Kings’ daughters were among thy honourable women: upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir.
verses.verse_html: 9Kings’ daughters were among thy honourable women: upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir.

verses.text_plain: Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father’s house;
verses.verse_html: 10Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father’s house;

verses.text_plain: So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty: for he is thy Lord; and worship thou him.
verses.verse_html: 11So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty: for he is thy Lord; and worship thou him.

verses.text_plain: And the daughter of Tyre shall be there with a gift; even the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour.
verses.verse_html:
12And the daughter of Tyre shall be there with a gift; even the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour. ▼
▼ favour: Heb. face

verses.text_plain: The king’s daughter is all glorious within: her clothing is of wrought gold.
verses.verse_html: 13The king’s daughter is all glorious within: her clothing is of wrought gold.

verses.text_plain: She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework: the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 14She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework: the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee.

verses.text_plain: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought: they shall enter into the king’s palace.
verses.verse_html: 15With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought: they shall enter into the king’s palace.

verses.text_plain: Instead of thy fathers shall be thy children, whom thou mayest make princes in all the earth.
verses.verse_html: 16Instead of thy fathers shall be thy children, whom thou mayest make princes in all the earth.

verses.text_plain: I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations: therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever.
verses.verse_html: 17I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations: therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever.
